relevant_findings.general: Well developed, well nourished, in no acute distress
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1S2 with no murmurs/rubs/gallops
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally with no wheezes/rales/rhonchi, normal excursion, no respiratory distress
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, no mass, no hernia, tender in the right lower quadrant, negative Rovsing's, negative psoas, negative obturator
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented to person, place, and time

relevant_findings.abdomen_imaging: Appendix is hyperemic with a thickened wall, fluid-filled, and distended to 1.2 cm with significant periappendiceal fat stranding. An appendicolith is noted. No drainable extraluminal collection or extraluminal air.
